# Get Page Insights

# Description

Retreive the page insights.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Page - Select the page from the drop-down list. This field supports String type input.
* Metrics - Enter the page metrics to retreive. The following category of metrics will be defaulted: Stories, Page CTA Clicks, Page Impressions, Page Engagement, Page Reactions and Page user demographics. This field supports String type input.









* Page insights - Automatically generated output variable.
